answers.answer: How big of a fluctuation? Mine has been anywhere from 120/70-140/85. But considering my last pregnancy I was 160/105 at one point with no signs of preeclampsia and no adverse effects my midwife isn't worried about a mild fluctuation.
I keep checking everyday may be that's howi came to know the fluctuation

question: I have varying bp 30 weeks now.. But no protein in urine as of now. Anyone ??
title: fluctuating bp
